name: AiVania
description:
A rogue AI has taken control over a derelict space station far from home. Explore this cold dark world in search of the AI construct. If something isn't done about it soon, the rest of the human race could be in danger.

Can be played with Mouse and Keyboard or Controller. I tested it with an Xbox One controller, and hope others work as well!

Controls

ActionK&BJoystickAttackLMBAForwardWL Stick UpTurnA, DL Stick Left/RightStrafeQ, EBumpers
